overview: Get ready for Mat Attack! Featuring the Can-Am debuts of the amazingly sexy Jet-Set models JASON ADONIS, MARC STONE, and ANTHONY SHAW. Plus, we've brought back built, beautiful GAUGE to teach some more lessons to unsuspecting new wrestlers. This time his victim is lean, longhaired ANTHONY SHAW. Wait until you see this pummeling! Jason and Marc are more evenly matched. Jason has the size, but Marc has the moves. He could surprise you and Jason. Each round in Mat Attack carries a price: sexual favors! Whether it be a blowjob or an ass pounding, the loser has to pay.
title: Mat Attack
